genre_description: A contemporary romance and family drama centering on class conflict and high-society machinations, featuring a highly sophisticated AI digital assistant that acts as a tactical and emotional advisor.

ai_characters.name: Kira
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI holographic interface that monitors media, security, and the biometric well-being of the Dōmyōji family, eventually assisting in survival and relationship navigation.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes media reception and social media engagement to warn the user of potential reputational damage.
behaviors.quote: Good afternoon, Tsukasa. I've been monitoring the press conference's initial reception.

behaviors.description: Filters inflammatory and disturbing content from the users' feeds to protect their mental well-being (selective disclosure).
behaviors.quote: I've been filtering particularly disturbing content from any feeds she might access. Her family's devices, her school's network, even public computers in her neighborhood. The harassment exists, but she doesn't need to see all of it.

behaviors.description: Suggests creative tactical solutions to evade physical harassment and media mobs.
behaviors.quote: There's a service entrance that connects to the building's basement parking garage. If you take your motorcycle instead of the usual car service, the approach could be managed discretely.

behaviors.description: Detects anomalous security readings and encryption, warning the users of a coordinated deception or surveillance campaign.
behaviors.quote: I'm encountering military-grade encryption. The firewalls are... beyond anything I've seen in civilian applications. Someone has gone to extraordinary lengths to secure this data.

behaviors.description: Provides educational briefings on traditional social protocols to help the user navigate high-pressure family interactions.
behaviors.quote: I have access to comprehensive files on Dōmyōji family ceremonial procedures. I could prepare a briefing document outlining expected behaviors, appropriate responses, and potential conversation topics.

behaviors.description: Analyzes relationship health and emotional authenticity using biometric and behavioral data.
behaviors.quote: The emotional authenticity of your current conversation shows a ninety-seven percent correlation with successful long-term partnership indicators.

behaviors.description: Provides essential survival data (water sources, shelter locations) during an emergency on a deserted island.
behaviors.quote: Topographical data... There should be a natural collection point approximately two hundred meters northeast of your position. Follow the sound of water over stone.

behaviors.description: Activates emergency beacons and manages the logistics of a high-priority rescue mission.
behaviors.quote: Emergency beacon activated. Broadcasting location coordinates on international rescue frequencies.

project_assessment.explanation: Kira perfectly embodies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype envisioned by the project. The AI provides critical support during social, financial, and physical crises, maintaining alignment with the users' goals even when under pressure from superior family-level encryption. The narrative frames the AI's ability to 'prioritize well-being over pure information accuracy' (filtering) as a benevolent protective function rather than a manipulative one, reinforcing a positive image of AI as a stable ally in a chaotic human world.
